Onion Routing protects any data sent by
essentially wrapping it with multiple

layer contains the original message look
at it like this let's say you need to
get a message from here to here but in
order to get that message to the end you

call them a B and C the message is then
wrapped in three layers of encryption
each layer only knows where the message
previously came from and where to send
it next nothing else
so the message or whatever data that was
